Title: Maxim Rysanov plays Schnittke Viola Concerto with TNSO under Alexander Sladkovsky
Description:
Maxim Rysanov (viola) plays Concerto for viola and orchestra (1985) by Alfred Schnittke (1934-1998) with Tatarstan State Symphony Orchestra under Alexander Sladkovsky
25 November 2014, Mariinsky Theatre Concert Hall, St. Petersburg
The concert was dedicated to composer's 80th anniversary.
Followed by interviews with Alexander Sladkovsky and Maxim Rysanov (in Russian).
